snippet.title: Dreadhalls - PC Gameplay Footage 02
snippet.description:
http://www.dreadhalls.com

Dreadhalls is a horror dungeon crawler for the Oculus Rift and Gear VR.

You are trapped deep inside a massive dungeon. Explore it, survive it, and find a way to escape. Your only weapons will be stealth, your own courage, and a faint light.

You can get Dreadhalls at the Oculus Store in both PC and Gear VR.
